title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Learning for Strengthening Mathematical Theory Construction Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math concepts (set theory, functions, geometry) and understanding of elementary school math curriculum
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify mathematical phenomena and construct a theoretical framework.
Learners can build mathematical theories through a process of hypothesis formulation, verification, and revision in VR simulations.
Learners can analyze their theory-building process and propose improvements through a peer assessment system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
